document_data.name: Nasr-uddin
document_data.mainbody: '''Nasr-uddin''', called the '''Lame''', was a prophet who traveled the [[Hordelands]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Description: Nasr had a long white beard that fit the physical appearance of a wandering prophet. He often wore long flowing robes.
document_data.Personality: Patience and precision was evident in all of Nasr's behavior
document_data.Activities: Nasr appeared to be spreading the teachings of [[Muhjari]] along his travels, though in reality he was a follower of [[Cyric]] and a paid [[assassin]] in the service of a merchant named [[Faroud]].
document_data.Possessions: Nasr owned an enchanted [[mace]], an enchanted suit of [[plate mail]], a ''[[potion of sweet water]]'', a ''[[potion of levitation]]'', and an iron flask that contained an [[invisible stalker]] forced to do his bidding.
